DataElement.preferredName: Immunotherapy Erythropoietin Prior Administered First Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the first date related to the prior administration of synthetic erythropoietin, a glycoprotein hormone, secreted chiefly by the kidney in the adult and the liver in the fetus, that acts on erythroid stem cells of the bone marrow to stimulate proliferation and differentiation.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the prior administration of synthetic erythropoietin, a glycoprotein hormone, secreted chiefly by the kidney in the adult and the liver in the fetus, that acts on erythroid stem cells of the bone marrow to stimulate proliferation and differentiation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Therapy that designed to induce changes of patient's immune status in treatment of disease. The concept encompassing various treatment modalities including active and passive immunization, treatment with immunopotentiators, immunosuppressants and nonspecific systemic immunostimulators and adjuvants, desensitization to any allergens, bone marrow transplantation, thymus implantation.

Concepts.definition: Therapy designed to induce changes in a patient's immune status in order to treat disease.

Property.preferredDefinition: Glycoprotein hormone, secreted chiefly by the kidney in the adult and the liver in the fetus, that acts on erythroid stem cells of the bone marrow to stimulate proliferation and differentiation.:Earlier in time or order.:Given.

Concepts.definition: Erythropoietin (193 aa, ~21 kDa) is encoded by the human EPO gene. This protein plays a role in both erythropoiesis and the maintenance of red blood cell volume.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the first date of an assessment, test, or treatment.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

DataElement.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
